mapContainer.style: relative w-full max-w-[1400px] overflow-hidden rounded-[15px] bg-[#a7a7a7] aspect-[4/5] sm:aspect-[16/9] md:h-[550px]

coordsHeadingStyle: text-2xl font-semibold text-black md:text-3xl w-full md:w-auto
coordsPlaceholderStyle: text-2xl font-medium text-black md:text-3xl w-full md:w-auto

locateButton.style: rounded-[25px] bg-[#3a31d8] px-10 py-5 text-2xl font-medium text-white shadow-md transition hover:bg-[#2f28ba] focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-[#2f28ba]
